titleStmt.title: The ladies answer to that busie-body, who wrote The life and death of Du Vall.
titleStmt.author: Cellier, Elizabeth, fl. 1680.
Pope, Walter, d. 1714. Memoires of Monsieur Du Vall containing the history of his life and death.

notesStmt.note: El: C = Elizabeth Cellier. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
